Package proxy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICommandResponse
    An interface for defining the object returned by ICommunicator.executeCommand
    Domain responseHeaders: http response header value for "Set-cookie"; can be NULL responseCode: http response code; cannot be NULL responseObjectFromJSON: object translated from http response JSON using GSON; can be NULL responseMessage: response message; can be null
    ICommunicator
    An Interface for the Communicator to be used for server-client communication
    IServer
    An interface for a Server
    ITranslator
    This interface is used to set the type of communication the http body will contain (json, xml).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientCommunicator
    Class Used for communicating with the server.
    CommandResponse
    a class representing the parameters returned from the ClientCommunicator after executing a call to the server via http
    Domain: responseHeaders: http response header value for "Set-cookie"; can be NULL responseCode: http response code; cannot be NULL responseObjectFromJSON: object translated from http response JSON using GSON; can be NULL responseMessage: response message; can be null
    MockCommunicator
    This class will contain some hard code data for the use of testing.
    Pair<Key,Value>
    A template class for storing a key and value pair; to be used for header titles and values being passed to clientCommunicator that will be sent as http headers
    PlayerCookie
    A class that represents the information stored in the player cookie as set by the server; used for decoding server cookie header response
    Domain name: player's name password: player's password playerID: player's catan session id
    ProxyServer
    A Server Proxy class that implements the Server Interface
    Domain singleton: singleton instance for proxy server; null until static setSingleton is used clientCommunicator: of interface ICommunicator and used to carry out http communcation with server cookieTranslator: of interface ITranslator and used to translate encoded cookie headers; must be set to correct type to translate cookie headers (should be TranslatorJSON for catan game) cookieEncoding: encoding used by cookie headers (should be "UTF-8" for catan game)
    TranslatorJSON  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RequestType
    A request type enum for specifying type of http request ClientCommunicator will be making
    Domain: GET = "GET" POST = "POST"
